Class KaraokeController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<LyricsView>
musicApp.controllers.songs.KaraokeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LyricsView.KaraokeListener
public class KaraokeController extends ViewController<LyricsView> implements LyricsView.KaraokeListener
This controller handles the synchronization of karaoke lines with the current playback time of a song.

    • getKaraokeLines

      public List<KaraokeLine> getKaraokeLines()
      Gets karaoke lines.
      Specified by:
      getKaraokeLines in interface LyricsView.KaraokeListener
      Returns:
      the karaoke lines

    • handleImportKaraokeLyrics

      public void handleImportKaraokeLyrics()
      Imports karaoke lyrics from a .lrc file and updates the song's lyrics. If a .txt file already exists, prompts the user for confirmation to overwrite it.
      Specified by:
      handleImportKaraokeLyrics in interface LyricsView.KaraokeListener

    • evaluateOverwriteTxt

      private Optional<Boolean> evaluateOverwriteTxt(Song currentSong)
      Evaluates whether to overwrite the existing .txt file for the current song. If the .txt file exists, prompts the user for confirmation.
      Parameters:
      currentSong - The current song
      Returns:
      Optional containing true if the user chooses to overwrite, false otherwise

    • handleShowKaraoke

      public void handleShowKaraoke()
      Starts the karaoke feature by creating a timeline that updates the lyrics based on the current playback time of the song.
      Specified by:
      handleShowKaraoke in interface LyricsView.KaraokeListener

    • handleStopKaraoke

      public void handleStopKaraoke()
      Stop the timeline so we no longer update lines.
      Specified by:
      handleStopKaraoke in interface LyricsView.KaraokeListener

    • handleSyncLyrics

      public void handleSyncLyrics()
      Called periodically by the timeline to highlight the correct line.
      Specified by:
      handleSyncLyrics in interface LyricsView.KaraokeListener

    • getActiveLineAtTime

      private KaraokeLine getActiveLineAtTime(javafx.util.Duration currentTime)
